Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: NewCombineVariable
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DECLARE @RNumber1 nvarchar(100) set @RNumber1 = right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),1)+right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),8) print @RNumber1

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DECLARE @RNumber2 nvarchar(100) set @RNumber2 = right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),8)+right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),4)+right (( SELECT (REPLACE(replace(convert(Nvarchar, SYSDATETIME(),14),':',''),'.','')) ),8) print @RNumber2

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: GoToMasterData
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Master Data Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Master Data Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: GoToBankAccounts
Keyword.Description: Master Data - Go To Bank Accounts

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Bank Accounts Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: CreateNewBankAccount
Keyword.Description: Create New Bank Account - And/Or Verify Status of Create Button after input parameters (Images\Customer\BankAccount\CreateNewBankAccount.png)

Param.Name: sBankAccountName
Param.Description: Bank Account Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankName
Param.Description: Bank Name - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAddress
Param.Description: input Address1;Address2;Address3, separate by semicolon ";", null means by pass input equivalent Address

Param.Name: sCity
Param.Description: City - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sCountry
Param.Description: Country - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sState
Param.Description: State - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sZipCode
Param.Description: Zip Code - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPhone
Param.Description: Phone Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFax
Param.Description: Fax Number - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sRoutingNumber
Param.Description: Routing Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sAccountNumber
Param.Description: Account Number - Note that this field is required field - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber1
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 1 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sFractionalRoutingNumber2
Param.Description: Fractional Routing Number 2 - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sPositivePay
Param.Description: Positive Pay - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankID
Param.Description: In case of PositivePay = WellsFargo, this field is required, null means by pass input

Param.Name: sCashAccount
Param.Description: Cash Account - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sBankAccountStatus
Param.Description: Bank Account Status - true means enable - false means disable - null means by pass input it

Param.Name: sExpectedCreateStatus
Param.Description: Success or UnSuccess, null means by pass verify

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: CheckCreateButton(Enable|Disable|EnableAndClick) - means check Status of Create Button is Disable or Enable, EnableAndClick means if button is Enable then click it

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: ValidateStringFromFileLinePosLen
Keyword.Description: Validate and/or replace string from a text file with input of File - Line - Position - Len

Param.Name: sPos
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read from the first char of line

Param.Name: sLen
Param.Description: start position need to get value, null mean read to the end char of line

Param.Name: sExpected
Param.Description: the expected string to compare, using |5* | or |5*0| or |5*X| for 5 space/0/X characters

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: GetTextAndActionOnFileByColumn
Keyword.Description: Get data and take action on text file by column

Param.Name: sColNum
Param.Description: get data at column number, start counting from 1

Param.Name: sSeparateSign
Param.Description: Sign use to separate Column, default is "," as csv file

Param.Name: sReplaceBy
Param.Description: will be replaced by string, use |space| or |blank| for special case of replace

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TOBUFFER(sVariable) - get string and import to buffer

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step

Keyword.Name: ActivateBrowser
Keyword.Description: Activate or Bring Browser to Front of current Webdriver

Param.Name: sWindowHandle
Param.Description: WindowsHandle of browser need to Activate

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Page_Login - Login to AP outsource web page

Keyword.Name: GoToPayments
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payments Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: isClick(false) mean check Payments Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: UploadNewPayment
Keyword.Description: Upload new payment (Images\Customer\Payment\20.png)

Param.Name: sAutomaticallyCreateBatch
Param.Description: Check or uncheck on checkbox Automatically Create Batch on Import - check|uncheck

Param.Name: sExpectedWarning
Param.Description: Expected Warning FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - YesAndExit means Pass if have icon warning then Exit Create Payment - YesAndNotExit means Pass if have icon warning then continue test case - No means not exists Warning Icon - null means bypass checking this - YesAndExit|YesAndNotExit|no|null

Param.Name: sExpectedError
Param.Description: Expected Error FrameworkImages\Payment\19.png - Yes means Pass if have icon error - No means there is no Error Icon - Null means by pass checking this - Yes|No|Null

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: TimeToUpload(5) means wait 5s after Upload Payment File

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Name: Comment
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark a comment for test step
